author: halil onay
content: I spent more than 5 hours trying to make a basic HP printer work. Printing and even standalone copying are completely blocked, although the hardware is fine. HP is forcing users into a monthly Instant Ink subscription by locking cartridges via software. Firmware updates, resets and support suggestions do nothing, because this is not a bug, it‚Äôs a business decision. This feels deceptive and exhausting. A printer should print, not require subscriptions to function.

Best decision I've ever made regarding printing. Just wanted to share the solution. Goodbye HP!
